summary: "Over the Garden Wall" is an American animated TV miniseries created by Patrick McHale for Cartoon Network. It follows two half-brothers, Wirt and Greg, who get lost in a mysterious forest and try to find their way home. Along the way, they meet strange creatures and experience magical adventures. The show is based on McHale's short film "Tome of the Unknown." It aired in November 2014 and was very popular, winning an Emmy Award in 2015. The story is set in a world inspired by 19th and 20th-century America. It has also been adapted into comic books and graphic novels.
title: Over the Garden Wall
